mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIL (email, auth_code, expire_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{authstr}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE auth_code = VALUES(auth_code), expire_at = VALUES(expire_at)
mapper.select: INSERT INTO MAIL (email, auth_code, expire_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{pwdemail}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE auth_code = VALUES(auth_code), expire_at = VALUES(pwdemail)
